item.title: Lifevantage Corp 10-K
item.description: Lifevantage Corp, which is in the Pharmaceutical Preparations [2834] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 23, 2022 had 33458 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: products - 335 instances independent - 299 instances may - 271 instances 30 - 264 instances company - 263 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
